Keywords: Armor , Latveria , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist , Warrior
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
THE MANY FACES OF DOOM: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a starting line of equal points on a character from your sideline that also has this trait. If you do, replace this character with the chosen character.
DOOM TAKES WHAT HE WANTS: Whenever Prisoner of Planet Doom KO's an opposing character, after resolutions choose one: Choose a standard power on that character's card. Prisoner of Planet Doom can use the chosen power this game -or- Choose a combat value. Prisoner of Planet Doom modifies the chosen combat value +1 this game.
A WORLD NOT OF MY MAKING, YET OF MY DESIGN: At the beginning of the game, if you are not the first player, roll a d6. 3-4: First player skips their first turn. 5-6: First player skips their first turn and this game Prisoner of Planet Doom may choose both options for his Doom Takes What He Wants trait.
DOOM WILL PREVAIL: Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks.
